topic.title: Chapter 1
topic.shortdesc: Cinderella losses her loving mother and gains a step-mother, who brings two of her own cruel daughters.

section.title: A Tragic Beginning
section.p: A woman with a young daughter fell sick and when the woman knew she was near the end of her life, she called for her daughter one last time. The mother told her daughter Dear child, be pious and good, and God will always take care of you, and I will look down upon you from heaven, and will be with you.
